name: Momentum (itch) (Spagev)
description:
Use a variety of weapons to manoeuvre more effectively, defeat enemies, fight the boss, and break out of the futuristic facility you have been trapped in!

NOTE: I made this nearly two years ago, so the game may feel unpolished and have some bugs. If you encounter any problems, I will do my best to fix them. Games I release in the future will hopefully feel more polished than this.
